mapper.insert: insert into staffNotice values( staffNotice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{contents}, to_char(current_timestamp,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 0)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as r, n.* from (select * from staffNotice order by noticeNum DESC) n) where r between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.update: update staffNotice set hit=hit+1 where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
update staffNotice set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
